entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 3:21 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: SSW 30 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
